title: Water polo: Montreal Olympics
creator_credit: Barry Williams, Dennis A. Hill and Dennis Hill Productions
brief_description: Includes excerpts from final rounds of water polo played between West Germany and Rumania, Hungary and Yugoslavia, Hungary and Italy, Italy and Holland during the Montreal Olympics held in 1976. Also includes a visual demonstration of training methods and rules and techniques as explained by the Dutch coach.
creator_credit_for_label: Barry Williams, Dennis A. Hill and Dennis Hill Productions
